name: Isolation (itch) (kmakai)
description:
Isolation

A fast, minimal action game about interactions and personal space

Use the arrow keys or WASD to move your square. Use the spacebar (hold it down) to expand your “zone," release it to shrink. Shrink your zone with others in it to score points and buy yourself time, score combos to get even more. Powerups are unlocked with combos, and change the properties of your zone.
